title: DISCOVER THE WORLD OF HYPNOTISM / Dr. Paret
description:
Discover the world of hypnotism with Dr. Paret. Our video shows a compilation of some powerful and uniques techniques, which everyone can learn and practice only in Dr. Paret's classes.
 
Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
